original_title: Al Madrigal: Why is the Rabbit Crying?
overview: In his first Comedy Central one-hour special, Al Madrigal tells true tales of Coach Frankie the Cholo soccer dad, "Liam Neeson" the mushroom-addled cleaning lady, and Jesus the day laborer mas fuerte! Download Al's new special. Now with 25% more Cholos!
title: Al Madrigal: Why is the Rabbit Crying?
